text: Egha kɨ an garima a sipsip mɨsosi. Ezɨ memen kam bar anɨngaghegha, gavgavim uabɨn akuigha ivegha ghua, sipsipɨn apurim uabɨ a gasegha an komning apɨriaghatɨ. Sipsipɨn apurim a munasan gavgaviba puvatɨ, ezɨ meme anekunizɨ a nguazim giraghuzɨ, ana dɨkabɨni. Ezɨ sipsipɨn kamɨn akurvaghamin bizitam itir puvatɨ.
